item.title: 05-Conda Install
item.description: Install Latest Anaconda / Miniconda Windows Linux 64-bit Miniconda 64-bit Miniconda Linux Install cd ~/Downloads wget https://repo.

item.title: 05-general python install
item.description: Install Latest Anaconda / Miniconda sudo apt install git python3-pip python3-venv sudo apt install -y build-essential # sudo apt install libgeos-dev python3 -m venv ~/envs/gen .

item.title: Post-Install Miscellaneous Steps
item.description: Install gnome tweaks sudo apt install gnome-tweaks Tweaking the GUI Open “Extensions” and turn off desktop icons Update firefox settings flatpak firefox settings found in ~/.

item.title: Python / Conda Intro
item.description: Python Python Installing Anaconda Packages 64-bit Linux Libraries Numpy Scipy Matplotlib Sympy Pandas Jupyter Other Notable Packages subprocess multiprocessing yaml opencv pytorch pyqt pyqtgraph pyserial Conda conda list Conda Environments Create, List, and Destroy conda create --name <env name> conda info --envs conda remove --name <env name> --all conda activate <env name> conda deactivate conda activate <env name> conda env export > environment.

item.title: Using Python in a Docker Container
item.description: Introduction This tutorial makes it possible to spin up a container with everything you need to run Python in a Jupyter notebook.
